content.title: Read short stories and flash fiction
content.description:
ðŸ¤– **MarcaPÃ¡gina** is an artifact (Web app) for reading short stories, flash fiction and contemporary fiction from any device. [We used to be a magazine,](/acerca-de/) now we are a platform to discover new literature, explore narrative [playlists](/playlist/) and participate in an active community around writing in Spanish.

Today you can access more than **[350 stories and micro-fictions](/cronologico/)** written by emerging authors from Latin America, selected with editorial criteria.

An important part of our catalog comes from the [Transtextos](/transtextos/) archive, a literary publishing project recently migrated to MarcaPÃ¡gina. We have integrated its complete collection of stories and continue to expand it. We also launched a [playlists section](/playlist/) where music and literature dialogue: each list accompanies the tone of certain stories, curated directly by their authors.

We publish new stories every week. MarcaPÃ¡gina works as a web application: you can read from your browser or install it as a PWA on your phone to take your readings wherever you want.

We are building the best space to read short literature on the internet. This is just the beginning.
